name: Lyvely
description:
Lyvely is a disruptive SocialFi platform built for the trillion dollar creator and freelancer economy. 

The ecosystem is powered by our native Utility Token, LVLY,  built on the Base network. 

Lyvely is backed by institutional giants including the Phoenix group, who is publicly listed and top 5 largest Bitcoin miners in the world. Other institutional investors include M2, the UAE's fully regulated Crypto exchange, and Cypher Capital, a global Web3 VC fund.
